## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                            |
| Rationale                         |  This order size ensures sufficient stock coverage for the next 5 days, considering forecasted demand and a safety buffer for potential variability. It also leverages a vendor order quantity that optimizes cost and reduces stock-outs. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     |  The recommended order size is 10,000 units higher than the player's planned purchase, aiming to improve stock coverage and potentially reduce stockouts. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     |  2.5 days                                  |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   |  6 days                                    |
| Comments                          |  This recommendation leverages multiple vendor order quantities (2 x 10,000 units). It prioritizes  sufficient stock availability for the next 5 days while minimizing excess inventory. |
